comment: Equality property for substitution, from Tarski's system. Used in proof of Theorem 9.7 in [Megill] p. 449 (p. 16 of the preprint). (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.) Revise ~ df-sb . (Revised by BJ, 30-Dec-2020.)
